column4: Latest;Takeo:------  Royal Gendarmerie forces visited some herb gardens at 9:30 am on January 14
column6: in Takeo province.------Marijuana plantations were discovered in Chroy commune
column9: 168 marijuana trees were found growing in 8 areas with total area of ​​648 square meters. Growing equipment was also destroyed along with the Devil’s lettuce.------Currently
column10: the police force is searching for the owners of the cannabis crops to and punish them by law. ------https://tvfb.news/article/17595
